education_text.0: In 1946, Kleene returned to the University of Madison, becoming a full professor in 1948 and the Cyrus CIn 1946, Kleene returned to the University of Madison, becoming a full professor in 1948 and the Cyrus CKleene's teaching at Wisconsin resulted in three texts in      Mathematical logic mathematical logic, Kleene (1952, 1967) and Kleene and Vesley (1965)At each conference of the      Symposium on Logic in Computer Science Symposium on Logic in Computer Science the      redirect    Kleene award Kleene award, in honour of Stephen Cole Kleene, is given for the best student paper
